title: An Act permitting persons to bring car damage arising from a pothole against the public entity into small claims court

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Chan of Quincy, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1613) of Tackey Chan for legislation to authorize the filing for damages in small claims court against a public entity arising from potholes under the jurisdiction of said entity.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
